trans-unit.source: Provides data for an event that is raised by calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for en hendelse som starter ved å ringe det <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*>for den <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> klasse.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapResolveEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A> method to enable subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event to return an instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SiteMapResolveEventArgs er brukt i <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>metode for å aktivere abonnenter <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>hendelse til en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>klassen.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event, you can create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> representation of a page without implementing a custom site map provider.
trans-unit.target: Ved å legge til en hendelse behandlingsprogrammet representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>hendelse, kan du opprette en <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>representasjon av en side uten implementering av en leverandør for tilordning av egendefinerte område.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Both the `context` and `provider` parameters might be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Både den `context` og `provider` parametere kan være `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> class with values that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>objektet initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs>klassen med verdier som ikke `null`.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that represents the context of the current page request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> som representerer konteksten for gjeldende sideforespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> som opphøyd i <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the context of the page request that the requested node represents.
trans-unit.target: Henter konteksten for sideforespørsel som representerer den forespurte noden.

trans-unit.source: Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen abonnenter kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>og <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>objekter for dynamisk å opprette en <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objekt og hente informasjon om den forespurte siden, for eksempel den forespurte URLEN samt brukerinformasjon.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>, if one is specified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>, hvis det angitte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> object that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> objektet opphøyd i <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen abonnenter kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>og <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>objekter for dynamisk å opprette en <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objekt og hente informasjon om den forespurte siden, for eksempel den forespurte URLEN samt brukerinformasjon.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no provider is specified during the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventArgs" name="EventArgs" href=""></xref> object construction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> som hendelsen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis ingen leverandør er angitt under den <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventArgs" name="EventArgs" href=""> </xref> objekt konstruksjon.
